doc.title: Bookmarking Views
doc.p: Views (window, cell) can be bookmarked for later retrieval. Choose "Bookmark This View" from the "Bookmarks" menu. A name is required to be entered for the bookmark. The bookmark will then appear in the "Goto Bookmarks" list.
The list of bookmarks defined can be loaded or saved by using the "Load Bookmarks" and "Save Bookmarks" functions from the "Bookmarks" menu.
